name: HighSchool Master Family Games
description:
Hey Virtual Dad! Get ready to take care of your virtual family like Family Man. Step into life of a virtual teacher and perform professional high school teacher duties. Wake up to Play best role of of Happy Family, Manage both your house and highschool teacher profession like a working virtual mom. Enter into this HighSchool Master Family Games and fulfill homelife responsibilities by performing Teacher duty. After completing your teacher duties go to your virtual home have new family fun.

Get fitted into the shoe of virtual school teacher life of high school simulator. It is not easy to manage your virtual highschool duties and take care of your virtual family life. Time to play as virtual father Ultimate Family Hero in HighSchool Master Family Games. Live highschool Teacher Happy Life to fulfill your family life responsibilities.

In this working dad HighSchool Master Family Games start your working day by helping your virtual family life. Manage your homelife as Super Family Hero and perform school professor duties with classroom teaching activities in school game. Keep balance with in your happy family also take care of your responsibilities. Work as a super dad virtual teacher in this new highschool life simulation.

Enjoy the life of virtual school life HighSchool Master Family Games and working family life of virtual mom. Start your happy family fun game, Control student and teach hard during exams in this family life teacher game. Don’t forget that you are Family Man keep your virtual kids homework checked as well. Spends quality time in virtual family fun. And Work as a Highschool Teacher for Happy Life family game.


Game features:

» Multiple virtual dad activities
» High Quality 3D Graphics
» Immersive Sounds
» Addictive virtual dad family simulator
» Exciting gameplay
» Smooth and Easy Controls
» Super Cool virtual house environment
